participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and ambitious, Emily is focused on her studies and has a strong bond with her best friend.
participant_1.background: i don't like chicken. i recently got an apartment with my best friend. i am in college to become a nurse. i work at a bar at night to pay for college.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and passionate about sports, Jake enjoys spending his weekends watching races and fights.
participant_2.background: i am a construction worker. in my free time i like to watch nascar racing and ufc. my favorite food is mexican food. i've been working since i was sixteen years old.

content.text: hello, how are you? what do you do for a living? I am a nurse
